name: Escape The IslanD (itch) (JOLLY JUMPER STUDIOS)
description:
(:PLEASE READ THIS(:BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD

guys this is my first game ........there are little bit of bugs in this freaking games ,if u play in highest settings there will be bugs like black screen,but not a lot,just a little bit.if u play this in low setting there will be no bugs,you should kill mr pukmantha in his office and get the key of the gate ,and go to the right corner of the map there is a gate escape the island by going thrue that gate ,mr pukmantha is at the top of the hill.......gg...............the game is little bit funny and action...........install the game and play,,,,,have fun guys ,,,,i will make more good games ,,,,,,,,,,,by JOLLY JUMPER STUDIOS,,,,for gamers by gamers,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,bye...comment ure ideas and bugs u found...ill fix them ,,,,,,,,,,thats all goodbye ,have fun killing mr pukmantha.THIS GAME IS  MADE BY GAME GURU ENGINE............................................
